review: I've been procrastinating going to the dentist for the longest time, and one of the main gripes from my previous experience was the unhealthy dose of patronising that came with elder/senior doctors. This time I researched a little bit, and found out about Dr. Mehta and Dr. Tiwary ar Tooth and Braces Dental Clinic. And am I glad I went there- thoroughly professional, supportive , kind and down-to-earth team. They did a detailed examination at first, explained everything that was wrong and what needs to be done on priority basis, and even asked if I have any preference on how to go about it- I was floored at the experience. Never thought I would one day gladly be going to the dentist! They took in to consideration my limited time in the city, and arranged an efficient timetable to make the most of my time, as well as getting all the necessary treatment done. All this for a very competitive rate- I couldn't be happier. I wish them all the very best, and I'm sure they'll end up being the top dental practices in the city very soon. Highly recommended!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Pooja and Dr.Aditya are the most professional doctors i have encountered in recent years. The way both the doctors explain the issues and the solutions is fantastic. I have made sure that my family goes to them for any dental related problems. I highly recommend Dr. Pooja and Dr. Aditya to anybody in need of professional dentists.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I got braces done here..my teeth really front.They looked like bunny teeth. All my life people around me made fun of how i looked . I went to Dr Pooja. She explained the whole procedure to me and i started the treatment. I can see such a huge difference in the way my teeth look in just 5 months of the treatment.I am really happy with my doctor and the clinic. i highly recommend this clinic for all dental problems

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had gaps in my teeth and hated my smile.I was becoming so conscious that i almost stopped smiling.I dint know what to do.Dr Pooja Mehta changed my life completely.She is a really good braces doctor. I got my braces done from her.She finished my treatment in 8 months. All my gaps have closed,and i am wearing my retainers now like my doctor asked me to.i highly recommend Dr Pooja to everyone who needs braces.
She is really good at her work and also down to earth. She explained every step very well. My daughter looks forward for her braces appointments. We are happy to have her as our family dentist

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very helpful and caring. Explained the problem, my age-related limitations and attended to the job with much care and attention. Very happy that I had chosen Dr. Pooja Mehta for my problem and the problem got resolved very satisfactorily.
